title: i have 748 orange essence
body: what do we do with them?

replies.body: You can use orange essence to upgrade skin shards into permanent skins!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=1t8H7t6Q,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-11-16T23:42:52.074+0000)
>
> You can use orange essence to upgrade skin shards into permanent skins!

that's it?!
